nodes.text: Weren Dal was a Kel Dor Jedi Knight who served the Jedi Order during the Clone Wars.

Weren Dal was a Jedi Knight who served as a General in the Grand Army of the Republic during the Clone Wars. Near the end of the war, Dal was flying a Delta-6 when she was shot down by CIS starfighters over Dathomir under the orders of Separatist General Teaok.

Crash landing in the northern region of the world below, Dal survived the initial crash but was severely injured. Taking her astromech with her, Dal located a nearby cave to take shelter in. Constructing a cot to sleep on, Dal died in the cave. Her damaged lightsaber remained at her side, along with the disassembled droid and a lock box containing its memory core.
